bug.short_desc: [compiler] [null] java.lang.StackOverflowError with annotation-based null analysis enabled and recursive types

long_desc.thetext:
What is your build id ? what is the project compliance level ?
Did/could you try 4.5 M2 ? I see one resolved bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=437087 and one still open: with similar stack traces.
I cannot download 4.5 M2 (I get the error message "Execution over HTTP is unsupported.") but this bug is indeed a duplicate of 437087 (and can be closed as such).
I can still reproduce on master.

Test & fix released for 4.5 M4 via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=2f38b76f2c6b366bcca95ee44591656cca072e8d
SO was caused by clearing the flag 'inRecursiveFunction' even when the current invocation hadn't set it.
Verified for 4.5 M4 with build I20141208-0800.

Candidate for 4.4.2?
Exception is bad and the fix is simple.

Released to R4_4_maintenance via commit 79e5bbb9101dbf17da1bdb78db9b442b02bf551e
(gerrit/hudson reported a failure: https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/39629/ which was in fact bug 422884, so not relevant here).
Verified for 4.4.2 RC1 using build M20150121-0900.
*** Bug 437087 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
